website_summaries.verdict: This hernia belt is both soft and comfortable against the skin.
pros: Latex-free construction ensures the hernia belt is built to last
Includes 4 panels that seamlessly conform to any body shape for a comfortable fit
Supports the stomach and back, and alleviates swelling, inflammation, and soreness
Simple to loosen or tighten the belt at your convenience
cons: May be too stretchy to provide comfortable hernia support at all times

customer_reviews.title: Plus Size and C-section
customer_reviews.text: I bought this so I could bind my belly after my c-section. Holy cow I loved it better than the one they gave me in the hospital. It's really good quality and it does not roll either- I was nervous since it is velcro. I highly recommend if you are plus size and recovering from a c-section. This worked GREAT. I wish I would have know about this with my first baby!
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Larson

customer_reviews.title: Good pain relieving brace.
customer_reviews.text: I've gotten too fat for my own good, hence giving myself backaches. This brace gives me enough relief to permit me to function normally. The brace actually relieves the miserable pain in my lower back and lifts my fat gut into a reasonable position.
customer_reviews.author: Greg 47

customer_reviews.title: Perfect amount of support for my abdominal hernia.
customer_reviews.text: I have a recurring abdominal hernia that has ruptured 3 times and frankly, I am tired of dealing with it. I recently bought this abdominal brace and I love it! While it is comfortable to wear, it gives me just the right amount of support that I need. I have felt so much better wearing this wrap that I plan on ordering another one so that I can wear one while the other is being washed.
customer_reviews.author: Dave M

customer_reviews.title: Used this after my surgery. It was very helpful ...
customer_reviews.text: Used this after my surgery. It was very helpful and supportive. I am a size 20-22 and this band was quite large on me but adjustable.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Newberry

customer_reviews.title: It works for me
customer_reviews.text: I have used this binder while procrastinating a repair on a rather large hernia. This binder works well enough. You will see in the pic it did stretch a bit - this is after 4 months of daily wear. It still did it's job, the only knock is it had begun to lose it's stiffness and would roll at the top. When it was doubled up from rolling it would get uncomfortable. But- for $35, worth it IMO
customer_reviews.author: G. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad of a product.
customer_reviews.text: We got a 2X, the belly measured 45 inches. It fits wonderfully. It has truly helped his hernia. We have only had this for about a month, washed it once and hung dry. In the picture you will see the wear and tear, the stretching of the material. It is now starting to fold over in places. Where the red triangle is you can see the elastic starting to come out. Out of all the products out there this brand and Company is by far the best. It doesn't hold up to everyday use well, so my advice is buy two of them and rotate. We will be purchasing a second one soon.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Jenvey

customer_reviews.title: nice support
customer_reviews.text: Workes ok for supporting my abdominal hernia, but you really need a helper to put this on and get it tensioned correctly. Putting it on by myself, I could not get the tension right and keep it smooth. Does roll a bit at the edges with your movement; good in that it does not pinch, but you'll be fiddling with it and straightening it often, in my experience, Kind of the nature of the beast. You will want to wear a tee shirt under it, as I dont thing it'd be comfortable against the skin for any length of time.
customer_reviews.author: Matt B

customer_reviews.title: Buy This! REALLY! It’s THAT good!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot recommend this highly enough! Everything about this brace is superior to others I’ve had. Even my surgeon loves it and asked where I got it from so he could recommend it to his patients. No joke! I had hernia surgery, 8”x10” mesh implant, 13 incisions, and a TON of pain!!! I would not have healed or coped nearly as well without this brace. If you even think you may have a use for this, JUST BUY IT!!! You will thank me later.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I’m  Still Hoping For Something Better
customer_reviews.text: I am obese and have frequent low back pain. I was looking for something to help hold me in to relieve pressure off my back. It is big enough unlike others I’ve seen and tried over the years. It is, however, awkward to put on with enough tension to actually be of help. I tried laying on the bed to put it on, as well as, standing. I just couldn’t make it tight enough to help. I wanted it to work. It may work for others, just not for me.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support.  True to size, so measure.
customer_reviews.text: After a bout with severe bronchitis, I have a sore stomach from coughing. The high level of adjustibility is this item's greatest strength (especially if you are curvy). However, i have gained about 20 lbs in 18 months and didn't have the courage to measure the middle of my stomach. It's ok standing but not over a tee when I sit. I'm keeping the smaller one as I must get rid of this 20 lbs . The width and design couldn't be better. BTW, I knew my stomach ( my largest measurement) was somewhere between 59 and 62 inches.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Clark

customer_reviews.title: Hold it together!
customer_reviews.text: I had bariatric surgery and tore my inside stitch. This helped wonderfully. I will consider it to be super spanx!
customer_reviews.author: vicki in MO

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable wrap without support.
customer_reviews.text: 1. It was difficult for 1 person to properly put on. The pulling and tugging and attaching the velcro across the wrap was not easy and frustrating. I did not feel that the support was there. I felt like I had a hot, uncomfortable wrap that did nothing but add a tight layer around me without feeling the expected support.
customer_reviews.author: J. Gentry

customer_reviews.title: In love
customer_reviews.text: Came before expected, came in good condition. Im 278lbs and 5'6 i ordered the 2x and could of gotten away with a 1x. Love how it fits under my clothes.
customer_reviews.author: jay

customer_reviews.title: This product works for me!
customer_reviews.text: It looks exactly like the picture and fits just like the picture. I'm a plus size and I use it to support my lower back and core when I have to work on my feet for long periods of time. I don't like to wear the extra firm back braces because they show under my clothes and they're too stiff and awkward. And I only need medium support. This product really works for me.
customer_reviews.author: MarvelMusic

customer_reviews.title: Works great but does stretch out
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because I am extremely overweight and started experiencing lower back and waist pain during my walks (as exercise) while it does help with the pain (I would say it relieved 95% of my back pain) and it is very comfortable, it does stretch out very quickly. I purchased a 2x and now I feel like it’s stretched out to a 3x. I still use it it’s just harder to get that really snug feel. I think next time I’ll size down. By the way, I was about 2 inches below the max waist size for a 2x, in case that helps anyone while deciding which size to get.
customer_reviews.author: Ana Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: Great supportive brace
customer_reviews.text: This brace was a life saver following my VSG surgery. I'm a teacher so standing and teaching was killing my stomach. I purchased this brace and it made life so much better. I would definitely recommend to anyone that has VSG surgery. It was easy to put on and very supportive all day.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Walker

customer_reviews.title: Order this before your surgery!
customer_reviews.text: I weigh 330lbs and not used to sizes actually fitting. I got the 4x and it was way to big but still worked perfectly. I had gallbladder surgery and didnt order this until 4days postop because the stomach muscles hurt so bad. It worked like a dream and I only wish I had it on day 1! I'm going to continue to use it during exercise to keep my belly from shaking after 100lb weight loss.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Best binder for both pregnancy support and hernia.
customer_reviews.text: Love, love, lo...ve this binder because it gived me the support I needed. I am 27weeks pregnant with an umbilical hernia which protrudes all the time, and that hurts like crazy. My old binder lost its ability to hold and was always coming off so decided to get another one. Being on large side with a huge pregnancy, I was big sceptical about the fit of this binder, but it fit perfectly, going around my tommy nicely and giving me the support I've been looking for. I will definitely recommend this binder to any plus size person out there, pregnant, with a hernia, or have had abdominal surgery, etc. 🤩
customer_reviews.author: big n bold

customer_reviews.title: The only comfortable and effective binder I have found.
customer_reviews.text: It washes nicely and dries quickly. Just don't throw it in machines. Follow the instructions. I have a connective tissue disorder and so the support is optimal. The most comfortable binder I have found to date and I have tried 6 different ones! This is a quality binder that is supportive and long lasting. It does not hold odor. It airs out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Feels like an old Army wool blanket, is as itchy too
customer_reviews.text: TERRIBLE!! I have allergies to the pain pills and the tegaderm that is on my back. I have a wound vac and was told to get this to hold the tegaderm in place so as not to have leaks. It feels like I’m wearing an old Army wool blanket. It should have been made with a cover to avoid the terrible irritation. So if you don’t like itchy wool blankets-DONT BUY THIS
customer_reviews.author: Tara M. Guillory

customer_reviews.title: Good for hysterectomy too
customer_reviews.text: I used this after a hysterectomy, and it was wonderful.
customer_reviews.author: Beth K.

customer_reviews.title: Use for jogging, very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for support while jogging. I have a strained abdominal muscle which was getting aggravated when exerting myself, and that was putting a damper on my efforts to get back in shape. I’m a big guy, and the segmented design of brace really help to offer support while still fitting around my gut, and the brace doesn’t move or ride up. I don’t really notice I’m wearing it. I’m very pleased. I found it easiest to Velcro the brace together before putting it on, and then slide it up my legs. This way I get a flat seam, a consistent fit, and I’m not pulling at the Velcro constantly as it’s very strong.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what was needed.
customer_reviews.text: This product was very well packaged and arrived in excellent condition. And it is exactly what we needed. It fits perfectly and is rather comfortable. It is made out of very good and strong material. It is very easy to fit to anyone, of a large size. I would recommend this product to anyone and everyone that is looking for a product of this kind.
customer_reviews.author: Frank

customer_reviews.title: Not made for longer torsos
customer_reviews.text: This was too short for my 6' tall husband. It also folded up at the bottom and became very uncomfortable for him. Now he uses under armor compression shirts to help support his stomach and it works much better
customer_reviews.author: Megan Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Eased my pain
customer_reviews.text: When I put this on it honestly doesn't feel like it's very tight or supportive. The first time I wore it I took my dog on an extra long walk without feeling any hip pain. When I wear it I can stand longer and walk more. It's visible under clothes but if I wear spanx over it it's not noticeable. My back and hips feel great. It's pretty comfortable and I have fallen asleep wearing it. I definitely recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndrelle

customer_reviews.title: I’m so glad that I bought this binder bc it has helped ...
customer_reviews.text: I was skeptical on buying but I’m gladness I read the positive reviews. I just had gallbladder surgery and this was very much needed. I’m so glad that I bought this binder bc it has helped to be able to do more and stand for longer periods without having pain.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Not as described
customer_reviews.text: The product is too small in height and the Velcro does not adhere to the wrap. Bought for post csection support.Huge waste of money. Do not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jason E

customer_reviews.title: Support of abdomen

I needed something to lift my drooping stomach to ease back pain to hopefully have the ability to walk and or exercise. Item is comfortable to even wear next to skin under clothing. Just not quite able to position to lift the stomach. If needing something to tighten around the abdomen this would probably work fine. Just not exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: A great product for my husband who has a rather large ...
customer_reviews.text: A great product for my husband who has a rather large hernia but is not able to do surgery at the current time. It has really helped him when he is on his feet an extended period or has lifting to do.
customer_reviews.author: ELTP

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable, high quality buy to help with small/moderate back pain!
customer_reviews.text: Very high quality. Very comfortable. Fits great. Velcro is top notch industrial strength. I recommend this entirely. It helps to some degree with my back pain, enough to get me back to walking and standing a bit more so I can lose the weight causing the pain in the first place. Not for severe back pain- you should get something with lumbar support and braces, perhaps. This fits wonderfully under clothing without needing other clothing under it- again, very very comfortable on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: Jaym Esch

customer_reviews.title: Not what I hoped, but not terrible
customer_reviews.text: It wasn't the size I expected and it tends to flip down at the top. Kind of difficult to get on but the website has lots of helpful tips. I was hoping for slightly better support but it works decently.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Mays

customer_reviews.title: Great support after hernia surgery but runs big
customer_reviews.text: I received a binder from the doctors office post hernia surgery but it was way too small. I ordered this one on Amazon and received it efficiently two days later. It runs a little big, I only wish I would have ordered one size smaller. Once tightened, it had an approximate 6 inch overlap which is hard to hide under a shirt. Aside of that, I couldn't live without it after my surgery. It gave me a lot of support and alleviated pain immediately upon putting it on. Having someone help you put it on ensures a tight supportive fit.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Beneficial for good back support
customer_reviews.text: Bought for hubby. He has arthritis in his spine and also has an overweight, belly forward physique. This product helps ease the tension on his spine and he does notice a difference. He wants me to buy another one now to use when his first one is being washed! Glad I purchased this! And it is very easy to use and is discreet under his shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Karen F.

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought this thing to help me hide my fat belly because other variations just didn't fit on my hips/butt without rolling up. Idk what this is actually supposed to do for people but it helps keep my fat tucked in so I like it! 10/10 would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: My return/refund was incorretly applied

customer_reviews.title: Excellent after abdominal surgery
customer_reviews.text: Helped so much after surgery! Was plenty big enough. And adjusts as I lose weight.

Some kind of super velcro is on it and so not the easiest ro deal with.but it does the job and fit correctly
customer_reviews.author: Annita Drink

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I did
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the Abdominal binder because I was having Bariactric surgery. I am so glad I did, as it provided me withthe support and comfort I needed. The binder fit extremely well, did not roll up, easy to take on/off. The fabric was supportive yet, not restrictive or uncomfortable. Wearing it made sitting/standing/getting in/out of bed far less painful. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: alison

customer_reviews.title: Great product to support hernia repair
customer_reviews.text: As advertised solid support. Great product to support hernia repair. Gives me a lot more confidence doing things and is comfortable Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Sinclair

customer_reviews.title: Use it correctly and it's worth it
customer_reviews.text: This needs to be super tight to work and support you well. I was first thinking this was a waste of my money but now that I have pulled super tight on it supports my back and belly wonderfully. You do need 2 people to apply this brace effectively. And it can have spots of discomfort around the rib cage but overall a fairly decent product.
customer_reviews.author: Determined

customer_reviews.title: It's better than the other binders
customer_reviews.text: I have been getting binders from the VA. Unlike other binders, this one has a Velcro-like surface that extends the entire length of the binder. You can tighten or loosen it as much as necessary for comfort and support. If you lose or gain weight, this binder will still work - with others, you will have to purchase a different size. Quality of manufacture appears to be good. I will buy this again if the binder holds up after several washes. The price is right.
customer_reviews.author: Shaggy8703

customer_reviews.title: All of which have herniated and been as repaired as possible) this for better than any other binder I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: As someone who is definitely on the heavier side and needs this type of support on a daily basis (9 abdominal surgeries, 4 incision sites... All of which have herniated and been as repaired as possible) this for better than any other binder I have purchased. No abdominal binder is gonna actually be comfortable, but since this one fits way better, so it's more comfortable than any other one since the one they strapped me up with in the hospital after my last surgery.
customer_reviews.author: John S Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Comfy

I actually like it alot better than the one theh gave me at the hospital. I probably could have gotten a smaller size, but i like how i can make it tight and it doesnt hurt.
customer_reviews.author: ChaoticBoo

customer_reviews.title: Great for after hernia surgery
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for my husband after his hernia surgery. He is 52" at waist and I felt there was room to wiggle in either direction ( if he lost or gained weight)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: A post-Op life saver.

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: Used it after an abdominal surgery. Was comfortable and supportive. My only suggestion is wear something under it, don’t wear it against your skin. It would be itchy and hot.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Great abdominal support after surgery
customer_reviews.text: I was very thankful to have this after hernia surgery. This gave enough support to help through the healing process and made standing up and sitting down much more tolerable.
customer_reviews.author: Silliejillie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: It's doing the job. Everything was jostling around when I mowed the lawn, over an acre. I then spent 2-3 days recovering. Got this brace, and it held everything in place. I like that it is nice and long, so it fits where I need it to hold saggy tummy in.
customer_reviews.author: Michigan customer

customer_reviews.title: what do you do with 14 ribs out?
customer_reviews.text: I am long waisted and finding a rib belt that would hold more than 2 or 3 ribs per side was not to be found. But this came in today and is plenty long to deal with all the ribs problems. Rib problems came from having a kidney stone removed from my right flank, it also dislocated/sprained all the ribs on my right side. None of the other belts helped, not tall enough to do more than add to the problem but this is great
customer_reviews.author: Maurice G

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable

customer_reviews.title: Great post surgery compression wrap!

customer_reviews.title: Fit Well

customer_reviews.author: Barb

customer_reviews.title: No other stomach control product has fit me but this one

customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.text: Had major hernia surgery...involved a lot of mesh. I really like the support of this binder and wish I had known about it while waiting for my surgery as it would have helped then too. I LOVE how it is totally adjustable...the binder is made of material that the velcro attaches to so there is no running out of room to bind it, even if you lose weight. product_meta.title: BraceAbility 2XL Plus Size Bariatric Abdominal Stomach Binder | Obesity Girdle Belt for Big Men & Women with a Large Belly, Post Surgery Tummy & Waist Compression Wrap
feature_bullets: HOW TO CHOOSE YOUR SIZE: Using a soft / flexible tape measure, find the circumference around the widest part of your body where you plan to wear the binder.

12” tall abdominal binder made of lightweight, plush elastic material with a hook and loop closure. The entire binder is hook and loop compatible, so you can easily adjust the fit and compression level and tighten or loosen throughout the day as needed. Latex-free.

Soft and comfortable against your skin - can be worn under or over your clothes. Constructed of four panels that allow the binder to conform to any body shape without rolling or bunching. Wear all day for abdominal support at work and at home, or while exercising and walking.

Supports your stomach, abdomen and lower back to reduce swelling, inflammation, soreness, stiff muscles and pain. The compression promotes blood and oxygen flow to speed up the healing process. Helps with strained or weak abdominal muscles, obesity-related discomfort, back pain from being overweight, bladder problems, post surgery recovery (liposuction, gastric bypass, cesarean birth, hernia repair, etc.)

Can also be used as a hernia or diastasis binder, a tummy tuck belt, and a girdle to help with belly apron, panniculus, or to hold in excess or hanging stomach fat. Provides a smoothing / slimming effect to your tummy.
